errors.default_error_short: An error occured, whilst trying to do that.
errors.bot_no_permission: I don't have enough permissions to do that.
errors.user_no_permission: You don't have permission to do that.
errors.no_recently_deleted_messages: There are no recently deleted messages.
errors.no_recently_edited_messages: There are no recently edited messages.
errors.user_not_found: User not found or isn't in this guild!
errors.cant_execute_on_staff: You can't execute that command on staff.
errors.cant_execute_on_self: You can't execute that command on yourself.
errors.failed_to_fetch_avatar: Failed to fetch avatar for this user. This is most likely due to the user having a default profile picture.
errors.invalid_equasion: Please enter a valid mathematical equasion.
errors.invalid_selected_emoji: Please enter an emoji that is from this guild.
errors.invalid_selected_role: Please mention a valid role, from this guild.
errors.invalid_arguments: One or more of the command's arguments are missing or invalid. Please read the command's help.

errors.cant_add_role: I can't add that role to you.
errors.cant_remove_role_from_you: I can't remove that role from you.

errors.invalid_name: Please provide a valid channel name.

errors.blocked_character: Your prefix contains an illegal prefix character.
errors.contains_space: Your prefix can't include a space.
errors.too_many_characters: Your prefix must be less or equal to 4 characters.

success.reset_prefix: Reset the prefix to the default one.

errors.already_has_channel: This server already has a logs channel.
errors.doesnt_have_logs: This server doesn't have a logs channel.

errors.wait_cooldown: Please wait 2 hours, before reporting someone again.
errors.report_channel_not_setup: Please set up a reports channel, before using this command.

success.report_filed: Your report has been filed to the staff team. Thank you!

errors.specify_time: Please specify a valid time. Example: `1d13h10m15s` (the ammount of time followed by the first letter of the unit).

errors.invalid_argument_tag: Please write if you want to tag everyone. (accepted responses: true, false)

errors.time_out_of_range: Please select a time between 6 hours and 1 second.

messages.sent_link: You are not allowed, to send links in this guild.
